**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 28 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 [Calmont](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1532) **Source** [Pathfinder #145: Hellknight Hill](/Sources.aspx?ID=4) pg. 27 **Perception** +6; [keen eyes](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=5) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6), [Halfling](/Languages.aspx?ID=7) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Breachill Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +7, [Mercantile Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +4, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +11 **Str** +2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +1 **Int** -1 **Wis** -1 **Cha** +2 **Items** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), _[lesser healing potion](/Domains.aspx?ID=15)_ (2), _+1 [shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77)_ (20 arrows), [Thieves' Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58) --- **AC** 20 **Fort** +6 **Ref** +11 **Will** +6 **HP** 35 **Deny Advantage** Calmont isn't [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39), or flanking creatures of level 3 or lower.
**[Nimble Dodge](/Feats.aspx?ID=550)** **Requirements** You are not encumbered. **Trigger** A creature targets you with an attack and you can see the attacker. **Effect** You deftly dodge out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+4 piercing **Ranged** _shortbow_ +9 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6 piercing **Ranged** dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+4 piercing **[Quick Draw](/Feats.aspx?ID=498)** You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion. You Interact to draw a weapon, then Strike with that weapon. **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** Calmont deals 1d6 extra damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures. **Surprise Attack** If Calmont used [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) or [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) for initiative, creatures that haven't acted are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to Calmont on the first round of combat.
